channel.title: Need help with ::alert
channel.description: I did everything right just 3 little error's im sure there not hard to fix but I just cant figure out any idea's? [code]AlertHandler.java:34: cannot find symbol symbol : method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: class Sprite c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX(), alert.getY()+alert.extraY, alert.getOpacity()); ^ AlertHandler.java:44: cannot find symbol symbol : method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: class Sprite c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX(), alert.getY()+alert.extraY, alert.getOpacity()); ^ AlertHandler.java:49: cannot find symbol symbol : method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: class Sprite c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX(), alert.getY(), hovered ? alert.getOpacity()+25 : alert.getOpacity()); ^ Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Finished! Press any key to continue. . .[/code]

item.title: Need help with ::alert
item.dc:creator: @robgob robgob
item.description:
@robgob wrote:

	public void drawSpriteOpacity(int i, int j, int k) {
		i += anInt1442;
		j += anInt1443;
		int i1 = i + j * DrawingArea.width;
		int j1 = 0;
		int k1 = myHeight;
		int l1 = myWidth;
		int i2 = DrawingArea.width - l1;
		int j2 = 0;
		if(j < DrawingArea.topY) {
			int k2 = DrawingArea.topY - j;
			k1 -= k2;
			j = DrawingArea.topY;
			j1 += k2 * l1;
			i1 += k2 * DrawingArea.width;
		}
		if(j + k1 > DrawingArea.bottomY)
			k1 -= (j + k1) - DrawingArea.bottomY;
		if(i < DrawingArea.topX) {
			int l2 = DrawingArea.topX - i;
			l1 -= l2;
			i = DrawingArea.topX;
			j1 += l2;
			i1 += l2;
			j2 += l2;
			i2 += l2;
		}
		if(i + l1 > DrawingArea.bottomX) {
			int i3 = (i + l1) - DrawingArea.bottomX;
			l1 -= i3;
			j2 += i3;
			i2 += i3;
		}
		if(!(l1 <= 0 || k1 <= 0)) {
			method351(j1, l1, DrawingArea.pixels, myPixels, j2, k1, i2, k, i1);
		}
	}
